content.detailedDescription: We saw about 8 fireball looking things hovering over trees and they seem to go down well about 4am they came back up and turned into red flashing light with a clear white one that stayed on and flew off.The next night we saw more of them and then the next we saw 27 of them.We havent seen but 1 since then and it was in a little diffrent location,also we could see some little white lights high in the sky that would zoom everywhere but they seem to be gone also.Contact me and i will give you alot more detailed info on what we saw.My whole family watched these.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange plasma looking fireballs that hover over trees,they travel any direction and seem to come in packs

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up from a deep sleep for no obvious reason at 10.15pm last night and felt compelled to open the bedroom blinds and look out. here in the south of england the night sky was faintly lit by street lamps reflected from the mist of volcanic particles filling our atmosphere at present. for perhaps three seconds i stared intently at the clearly defined shape of a triangular black craft which passed silently overhead and out of sight over the house.  its shape was of an elongated triangle, reminiscent of concorde. it had lights at each of its three points - red to the front and two white. it was flying to the west at the relatively low height of a small private plane, and was the size of a large passenger aicraft, but silent. 

the flying ban due to volcanic ash is still in operation throughout the uk, and we have not even had the regular chinook helicopter patrols patrolling around nearby aldermaston nuclear plant for the past few days, and none of the usually constant heathrow and gatwick air traffic.

the craft's path would have brought it from the direction of flaring orbs in the sky which develop false navigation lights and which we have been observing for some months. our aldermaston orbs bear a strong resemblance to those repeatedly filmed by alison kruse in pennsylvania, usa, and posted by her on you tube at http://www.Youtube.Com/user/moreseeingufospa

interestingly, during daylight hours on monday last week, before the flight ban was imposed, an unmarked military helicopter flew at roof top height over a heavily populated area and towards the aldermaston orbs. who is observing whom?!
content.summary: Large black triangular craft passed silently overhead - newbury, uk

content.detailedDescription: i have this feeling to look outside the patio and look up and saw 2 white orbs moving side by side, i call my partner to look up too, he said he didn't see anything, but finally he did and said that they were amazing.  he couldn't believe what he was seeing.  since i have seen them before just in the same place and always keep looking up having the feeling i am going to see them again. after about 10 minutes they desapeared. when back inside and talk about it.  i get the sensation that they want us to see them and get used to them, so when they show themselves, we are not so afraid of them.
content.summary: 2 white orbs moving side by side.

content.detailedDescription: On sunday 4/11/10 i was out feeding my dogs in my backyard at around 10:18 pm. i tend to face the western sky when i fill their food bowls and i tend to look at the sky while getting their food ready or giving them water. this time i noticed a bright light in the western sky. at first i thought it was a plane but then realized that it was stationary and as bright as the light was, i would have clearly seen any movement had it been a moving object. after feeding the dogs and viewing the object for about 20 minutes i decided that there was no way it was a plane and decided to video tape the stationary light. i only taped it for a few seconds since i couldn't get my camera to focus on the object clear enough. i then watched the object a little while longer and it eventually slowly moved heading in a slight north west direction and i lost it behind a house. having doubted myself and thinking that this sighting was anything but an extremely bright star i paid no further attention to it. two days later on tuesday 4/13/10 i went out to my backyard once again to feed my dogs and again i viewed the same object in roughly the same area. at this point i thought to myself that this must be a star, however i still wasn't completely convinced. so after feeding my dogs i grabbed my camera and made my best attempts at video taping the object. again the size of the object had me thinking i was watching a plane but having lived here as long as i have i pretty much know the areas with all the air traffic. the lights on the object also got me thinking it was a plane but the more i watched it the more i realized that the lights seemed to be rotating on the craft. i don't have a tripod so the video is extremely shaky and the camera had a very difficult time focusing on it. i changed the camera to manual focus but when it was on manual focus i was unable to see the object at all through the lens. as i watched the object with the naked eye i realized it was starting to move ever so slightly. it first moved as if it were coming closer as in heading in an east direction and then south-east. the object then seemed to slightly move north but the movements were so subtle and minute that if it weren't for stars and planets positioned in the sky i wouldn't have noticed the movement. i taped the object for about 7 minutes off and on. i started tape at 10:10 pm and stopped taping at 10:25 pm. i continued to watch the object for another 20 minutes or so as it seemed to head west and eventually i lost sight of it behind the same house. this time i decided to go to the front yard and see what i could see from there and the object was definitely heading west and i then lost it behind some trees. i checked back the following days and there was no sign of the thing i saw. i found the stars and planet that i used to map out where the object had been on those 2 nights yet the object was no longer there. i'm still unsure of what i saw. having seen objects of unknown origin in the past i'm not exactly surprised but at the same time i don't want to jump to conclusions. i showed the tape to my brother and my wife and they both think it doesn't look or behave like a man-made aircraft and the lights seem too controlled and bright to be a star and too bright and blinky to be a planet. (if you would like to see video i only have it on an analogue video tape. my digital camera would have never been able to catch sight of it.)
content.summary: A white ball of light with red & bluish green light rotating around it in the western sky seen on 2 nights (4/11 & 4/13).

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were walking down the street to my local store from my apartment and i happened to look up,as i heard an airplane that was particularly loud. i saw at first what appeared to be a single, sphere shaped craft that seemed to be trailing the airplane. it was "silver" in color when i first spotted it. as i followed the sphere trailing the airplane, it suddenly stopped. i mean it just stopped moving and was perfectly still. i couldn't believe my eyes. suddenly, the sphere began to turn baby blue as if it were reflecting the sky. it wasn't an immediate change, but more like an exotic lizard--it didn't take more than a few seconds. subsequently, it then changed from blue to the most amazing green that would describe as emerald, then red. when changing colors it gave the appearance that the craft was "wobbling" as the craft would begin the color change at one end of the sphere and it would make its way to the other side. the best way i can describe it alternately is like a modern lighthouse that moved its light beam in a circular motion parallel to the ground, almost like an old fashioned police car siren. i was pretty much just standing in the middle of the street completely mesmerized. about 2 minutes into this i see another sphere that shot by the stationary sphere at incredible speed. i then moved my focus to the new object. it was identical to the first. in order to keep up with it i was pretty much just spinning in circles. i then see another sphere catch up with the fast moving one (#2). they flew in tandem for a few minutes or so and then suddenly reduced their respective speeds to half that of a conventional aircraft and it was at this point that i noticed the silver appearance began to fade as the crafts began to oscillate and change color, still adhering to their formation. very spooky. in all i believe that i saw 4-5 spheres--but given their intermittent high speed and hovering behavior, it is hard to say precisely how many there were in the air at that time. definitely at least 3 as at one point there were 3 craft in my field of vision. the funny thing about all of this is that during this whole experience there were still airplanes that were flying either to or from the airport nearby. the craft just seemed to effortlessly avoid the airplanes and at times they appeared to be chasing them, only to turn around and shoot off in another direction. the whole event lasted approximately 20 minutes as one by one the spheres just seemed to disappear. they didn't fly off into the horizon but just kind of vanished instead. this is the second ufo that i have seen...Both sightings within 2 years of each other. both were here in north carolina, one in greensboro and the previous one in snow camp, north carolina which is about a 45 minute drive from greensboro.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Translucent, color changing sphere in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription: Walking around with some friends at 11pm-12pm and my friend out of no where says hey look,i look up and i see these two yellow orangeish pair of floating spheres about 100ft away and 35ft high and they hovered for a little bit then flew off
content.summary: Yellow orangeish pair of floating spheres.

content.detailedDescription: Lived in san francisco's richmond district (nw corner of the city, 2 blocks from the ocean). i left home for my nightly walking-jogging exercise. while facing south on the crest of the hill at one of the high-numbered avenues- about 44th ave., doing my stretching exercise before heading down the hill, i looked roughly southwest and saw four large, bright, flat discs forming a diamond shape (one up, one down, one left, one right), all white, with each light, in seemingly random order, flashing slowly off and on. just four lights stationary in the sky, and they appeared to be no more than 3 or 4 blocks away. i watched for a few minutes, then proceeded down hill southward to anza street, which was the next street down, walked westward, and stopped at the driveway of the house which sits at the top of the cliff. (if you're familiar with the famous cliff house at the beach in san francisco, you stand out in front of the place, look up toward the top of the hill and see a house. that's where i was. i watched from the driveway of that house.) i stayed there and watched for a few more minutes. the lights stayed in the same spot and continued their blinking. i then went back eastward to 44th ave., and continued downhill to the level of the ocean, in an attempt to get closer to where the lights seemed to be positioned (it appeared that they were hovering above the beach near the safeway). as i continued down the very steep hill, i lost sight of the lights, because the houses on my right blocked my view. when i reached the bottom of the hill, which was near the safeway grocery store-at-the-beach, the lights were gone. there were some people waiting at the bus stop near the bottom of the hill, and i thought of asking them if they had seen anything, but as i looked at them, i could immediately tell that nothing unusual was occuring, or had occured. i continued my exercise walk up and down the avenues as if nothing had happened, but i told a couple of friends about my experience. incidentally, i was not- and am not- a drug user. i was calm throughout the experience and maintained an objective attitude. i felt nothing strange or unusual. nothing like this has happened before or since.
content.summary: 4-flat , white round lights forming diamond shape, stationary, ea. light, in turn, slowly flashing on/off

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were at cuivre river state park at the equestrian campground.  we had gotten our horses settled in and were getting ready to sit down by the fire and relax.  my wife noticed a bright object in the sky that was stationary or possibly moving toward us.  i first thought it was a planetary object, but that didn't make sense based on location and the time of the year.  the brightness of the object caught our attention.

we got out our binoculars and as we watched, the object began moving west at a fairly rapid speed.

the town of old monroe is about 14 miles south east as the crow flies from where we were camped.  it appeared (based on cell tower locations and watertowers) that the object was over or near old monroe.  

in the binoculars, the teardrop shaped object had amber lighting on the sides and red lighting on the nose, top, and tail.  the object then covered the distance between old monroe and moscow mills in approximately 5 seconds while abruptly taking an upward attitude, then disappearing instantly.

we were both astounded by the behavior of the object and the speed at which it departed our view, and also the colorings and shape.  

i am a 14 year veteran of naval aviation with over 5000 hours in type aircraft (p3b/cuii orion) and i know aircraft behavior.  no aircraft i know of can change direction this abruptly and cover that much distance in such a short period of time.

i'm hoping others saw what we saw and will come forward.
content.summary: Observed a stationary light initially thought to be a planetary object but then moved rapidly west

content.detailedDescription:
Boyfriend and i were driving back home to athens, right outside of gainesville i noticed a flourescent green triangle shape with perhaps a few other lines. it was hovering directly in front of our car, appearing to be several kilometers in the air and i don't know how far away. i wasn't able to compartmentalize the image well because as soon as i started staring at it, it seemed to zoom off into distance in a split second. it startled me because i had instantly realized that i was seeing something very bizzare, and i asked my boyfriend, "did you see that?" and he said, "yes, what in the world was it, a comet?" i responded,"um, i think that was a ufo!" and he replied, "i think you're right, because a comet wouldn't have disappeared like that!"
 the end.
content.summary: Boyfriend and i saw bright green triangular object hovering above the car, then zoom off in a split second.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped onto our front entrance to get some fresh air. i looked up at the shy and for a change was full of stars. i noticed a bright object moving toward the east going a short distance then appeared to back up and travel forward again the same distance. after watching for a while i got my binoculars out for a closer look. at first i thought i was jerking the binoculars in my hands but i held them against one of the support beams of the entry way. i could not get over what i saw through the binoculars. the object i saw without the binoculars was moving very erractic. in the center was a pale white area and the object would pulsate and each time it pulsated red green and blue lights would appear on the opposite of its movement. at one time the object split apart and became two and joined back togather to form one unit. the object would not remain stable veiwed through the binoculars but just looking at it with them them object was like a star or satellite moving forward then backing up doing the same thing over and over. i watched this object for at least 2 hours. two pale white objects appeared some distance below the one i had been watching. i cannot tell how far away these objects were. may have been a few miles but hard to tell being dark and no reference. i called my wife out to see the first object she watched it for a while but her sickness would not allow her to stay very long.  after watching this dislpay clouds moved in so i had to stop. i don't think i saw an optical illusion and do not belive this was a man made object or machine. at night in this area there have been many objects appear in the sky. yes an airport is near by but not that many planes in the area. a few years ago my wife and i saw the giagantic fly v shaped object not far from our home here. will never forget that. i hope that whoever was controlling what we saw last week are friendly.
content.summary: Appeared to be a satelitte but kept moving back and forth

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window as i do every day when i noticed a shiny metalic objectic moving south in a very eratic pattern it was just a little over the clouds, as when it passed the clouds it seemed to go behind them. i only watched it for a couple of minutes be fore it dissapeared behind some clouds. where i live the air traffic usally follows an east west pattern, this was clearlly going south and it was about 2 degrees from 12:00 high so it was almost over head. it appeared to be small and disk shaped very shinney as when the sun hit it it shined like a star, and it was moving in a ver jaged line but still south.
content.summary: Eratic metalic craft moveing south

content.detailedDescription: Big sister seen first then called others outside me and brother whersleeping
content.summary: My mom and 2 sisters and sisters boyfriend seen ship up close

content.detailedDescription:
I saw one of these two weeks ago but got too busy to report the sighting. and i did not have my camera.
yesterday i saw another one and then two appeared side by side hovering above the clouds.
i ran and got my camera and the battery would not work and it was fully charged.
i finally got it to work and noticed they were barely visible anymore.
they were gaining altitude fast. then the clouds came through very heavy but
i started shooting anyway and held the camera steady on the tripod and just started
shooting . i downloaded the footage and could see them but they were so high
up at this point. i will share the pics anyway.
i will be keeping my eyes in the sky more now for better shots!


leah:)
content.summary: Two bright orbs hovering together

content.detailedDescription: For the past couple of weeks our family has viewed a diamond shaped object with multi color facets that pulse in the eastern sky at 9:15 pm every night. after looking at it thru binoculars and noticing it wasn't a star we decided to view it thru a spotting scope.It's very bright and seems to have some kind of nucleus that looks like a upside down t.It looks enigeenerd and not a natural object like a meteror.My husband thought maybe it was a satellite in sync with the earth's rotation,but after discussion we feel that it is much bigger than a satellite or the iss.We are wondering what this could be and would very much like to know!
content.summary: Seen thru a scope pulsing diamond object with facets with red/blue/green outer edge.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling west on highway 21 near auroraville, wi and had been noticing and photographing some unusual clouds.

i was driving at the time so i was holding and pointing my camera south and not looking at what i was photographing so i could keep my eyes on the road ahead of me.

i was using a canon a1000is which is usually very fast to focus and snap  photo's. in this one instance when i pressed the shutter release there was about a full second of delay and then a bright flash of light filled the inside of my truck and then the camera captured the photo.

i remember at the time thinking wow was that bright. it wasn't until later on in the day when i remembered the unusual set of events and i went back to look at the photos and saw the unusual object in the photo.

it's hard to see but it doesn't look like any type of aircraft that i've ever seen so i thought i'd put it out there to see if anyone else knows what it was.
content.summary: I was taking photos of strange clouds and noticed a strange object in photo.

content.detailedDescription: Returning from church driving west on rt 213 in methuen ma with 14 yr old daughter when i noticed a red beam of light from the clouds directly to the ground it lasted app 5 seconds at arms length it was the with of my pinky finger. 2 seconds after red beam of light i noticed what apeared to be a very bright white light approx 2000 feet of the ground it seemed to be approx 30 ft wide heading west they were not landing lights of an airplane as object was heading away from me!!!
content.summary: very bright red beam of light.

content.detailedDescription:
Just before sunset
se
appeared stationary at first or moving slowly, south or south west
it caught my eye because it was reflecting sunlight from the sunset, 
and looked kind of like a plane but it wasn't moving and didn't have a comtrail like other planes in the sky at that time.

my boyfriend, who was driving, asked what i was looking at.
when he looked, i asked, "is that a star?" because it didn't look like it was moving.
he said it wasn't a star but he couldn't tell what it was.  he asked it if was moving and almost like it was waiting 
for someone to notice it, it started moving.  at first slowly south or south west. it went from moving slowy to moving so fast
it disappeared behind the tree line.

it was cigar shaped and very reflective.
my boyfriend and i can't agree on the size, but it wasn't small.  he thinks it was about twice the size of a cessna

by the time i realized it was something worth taking a picture of it was too late.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hung in the sky for a few seconds before darting off

content.detailedDescription: South of north manchester there is a gravel pit on state road 13. in the past there was a old dirt road surrounding the gravel pit. it is now blocked off and closed. while traveling north on 13 on april 12th at approximately 11:10pm i saw an oval shape of white lights...Roughly twenty lights on the ground on the opposite side of the gravel pit. there is no access to that side anymore by vehicles. there is a railroad just to the east of there...But there is a woods between the gravel pit and the railroad...And no train has that many lights on it. the oval seemed to be transparent and was roughly twenty feet across. it never moved or made any sound. saw this as i was driving by and did not stop.
content.summary: Twenty lights shaped in an oval

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and i noticed a very bright light that looked like plane but it was significantly brighter than other ones in the sky. i had noticed it far away and but then when i stopped at a light it was right in front of me so i turned off my radio and rolled down the window as i got out my phone to take a picture. i didnt hear any noise of a plane or helicopter so i knew it was different so i took a pictures. i had also noticed as i was driving away i could see the light through the trees, which wouldnt happen with spotlights from a plane. but as you can see from the picture i took the object is significantly brighter than the street lights. throughout the event i was very calm until after i lost sight with the object and pieced together everything i saw.
content.summary: Looked light a plane or helicopter but too fast low bright and quiet

content.detailedDescription: There were 4 of us visiting the lake cottage in northern wisconsin - we were sitting around the bonfire watching for meteor showers - when we noticed a small star-like object heading south at a rapid pace - we first thought it might just be a satellite - then notice 2 more following at the same rapid pace - when one of them made a full u-turn and started to head back north towards where the big-dipper was positioned in the sky at that time - then the other 2 had turned around and headed back north - they all looked fairly the same size as a star in the dipper - then the actually formed a sort of triangle and their lights then faded to very faint, almost hard to see - then about 30 seconds later, a 4th star-like object headed to the same area at a rapid pace then it's light slowly faded - all 4 objects just sat there for a good 5 minutes as the light seemed to fade further away into space - it was one of the most amazing things to see - and realizing satellites don't change course like that or do u-turns - being that they were so far up in space, we didn't have a camera capable of taking pictures of stars etc...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first thought we thought they were satellites...

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were watching tv with the front door open.  we have a storm door and we both observed what seemed to be a very bright star.  we both commented on this "star" then a few minutes later we observed that the star had not only moved up and to the right but had gotten brighter.  we are aware that we can see aircraft going to the atlanta airport.  we see them all the time but this was different.  then we observed the "star" to move vertically and to the right, then vertically to the left while this "star" was doing this we also observed that it would get very dim then get very bright.  we got your binoculours and went outside because this was very odd to us and then we both observed the "star" to continue moving up, down, to the left and to the right and at the same time once again it would get so dim we could not see it then it would very bright!  when we first noticed the object we thought it was odd because almost every night we sit with the door open and are very aware of what stars we see every night.
 this was something we had never seen before.  i myself am a beleiver in ufo's and my husband is a huge sceptic.  the fact that he could not explain what we were observing really excited me.  at first we though it was a airplane but it made no sence with it moving in the manor it was moving and the brightness of this object dimming then brightining, with no clouds around to speak or see of.  we went from just laughing and courious to complete confusion and amazement. neither of us could make out a normal explanation for what this was.  finally after all of the movement and the dimming and brightness of this object it simply dissapeared.  we could no longer see it.  it dimmed and never brightened back up.  we have been outside with our binoculers ever since we first started observing it around 9:10 just trying to find this object.  we just came back inside and my husband and i felt we needed to let someone know about this.  this is very far out of our comfort zone as far as reporting this.  if this wasn't such an amazing moment, we would had not felt the need to share what we both saw tonight.  we both grew up a few miles from an airport and we both feel we know when we see an aircraft.  this was too odd the manor of which this "star" moved and changed brightness.  this was not an aircraft or helicopter.  we just do not know what it was. it is now 10:30 pm.
content.summary: We observed a star like object move up down left and right with light dimming and then getting brighter

content.detailedDescription:
Low flying and short sighting off hamburg beach ny

about 10 quick bright flashes, almost looked like fireworks towards buffalo. at first we figured it had something to do with the saber game but they lost:( 

this was definitely not a plane or firework!
content.summary: Very bright fast flashing light over lake erie 9pm

content.detailedDescription:
My name is e and i'm eighteen years old. i live in laconia. last saturday night, my boyfriend d came up to see me and we went out. when we got to (edited), in laconia, we parked in the back in the separate parking lot. we turned off the car and it was totally silent. we were just sitting there and i looked up at the moon. i saw this weird black-shaped object. and then, i said to my boyfriend, "what was that?" he looked up at it and he said, "if it gets any closer, we need to leave." i kept staring at the moon to see if it was just a plane or something. it moved back across the moon. it was huge and it looked like it was zig-zagging or changing shape. i couldn't tell. he said, "i think it's coming closer." it flew so fast over the trees getting closer to where we were. it felt like it was zeroing in on us. it blocked the moon. and then, we started panicking and driving away. i thought were were going to hit the [cms/tg/pid] building. we turned left but it felt like we went off of a jump. you know that feeling? like we were on a rollercoaster? and we were in the air. i was trying to pay attention to everything that was going on but it felt like i couldn't. when i looked up, everything was black. the smell was not nice but it was like something you could stand. it was an odor i've never smelled before. i heard absolutely nothing. it was silent. i felt immobilized like i had no control over what i was doing or over my body. i could see nothing. it was like opening your eyes in a pitch black room.

i felt really nervous and scared. i don't remember crying or screaming. i held on to the center console because i felt like i was lifted. i was holding on so tight that my thumbprint is imprinted on the center console. and then, when i finally realized what was happening, i was so close to the windshield that my body was going forward with my arms behind me. everything was black. i heard a loud noise like a horn. once. and then, the car just dropped. i hit my eye on the dashboard and the airbags came out. i couldn't believe what had just happened. i held my face and i looked over at my boyfriend. i saw that his left arm had blood. i said, "are you ok?" i looked at the windshield and it was cracked, totally, but only on the passenger side. i could see d but i couldn't see anything outside. the only thing that made the car drop was the sound of the loud horn. when the car dropped, there was a loud boom. after that, we just drove so fast out of there. the smell went away after we drove away. and i started crying. and i said, "what the hell just happened?" my boyfriend said, "i don't know, i don't know." i didn't feel like they were following us.

when we got home, my mom said that she could hear me from the outside while i was freaking out. i couldn't stop crying. my mom said, "calm down and tell me what happened." i said, "you're never going to believe me." "is it my car?" she asked.

and i said, "let me explain," because i felt that if i didn't explain it fast enough, it was just going to go away from my mind. at about 12:15 am, a cop arrived. i told him what had happened while i was sitting down at the dinner table. my boyfriend was sitting next to me. it was then that i noticed that there was no more blood on his arm or his clothing. the cop didn't believe me at first until he finished looking at the car. he told my mom that there was no reason for the air bags to come out because nothing else on the car was damaged. he didn't check underneath the car but we found out later that the underside was totaled. the cop said that he was going to the place where we had been.

i just felt thankful that we'd gotten out of there. but i couldn't stop crying for more than 2 hours afterwards. my mom said, "you should go take a shower and get the airbag dust off of you." but i didn't want to be alone at all. i felt lucky. and there were no scratches or anything anywhere on my body.

the first night, my dream was that i was a little girl, maybe 6 or 7 years old, in an elementary school classroom. i was looking at myself as a little girl. and then it was like the teacher called me up and i couldn't talk or say anything - but everybody else seemed to say something for me. like everything i wanted to say, everybody else was saying it except for me. they were saying exactly what i wanted say. i have never had a dream like this before. where i am a little girl and see anything about the past. i did not feel right at all.

i am better now. i still worry about seeing this thing again and i pay attention to the sky at night. i really don't go out at night, anymore, because i'm scared.


2nd witness account:

my name is d. i am sixteen years old and i live in new hampshire. last saturday night i went out with my girlfriend, who lives in laconia, when we had the following experience: i was with her around 11. we wanted to take her mom's car because it was nicer and we wanted to go look at the stars. we went to (edited) at the back parking lot in laconia. there were 8 cars already there when we arrived. little by little, the cars started leaving one by one. we were the last car in the parking lot. then the lights of the parking lot and the lights of the houses around us and the lights of the houses down the street started to go out one by one. then my girlfriend noticed something blocking the moon and asked, "what was that?" i knew it wasn't a cloud because it moved back against the wind and blocked the moon again. i don't know how to explain this but it turns into a ball when it wants to slow down and move around quickly and when it wants to go fast, straight, it turns into a flat plate with maze box-shaped lined lights. these were on all the time. the colors were dim yellowish white and did not change. i cannot tell whether these were part of the bottom or not. it flipped a lot. i did not know which side was right or up on it. it was doing this over the trees across the street from the parking lot. it suddenly crossed the street towards our car. its size was as big as 14 houses. it was really quiet. that's when we had to leave. but i did not have time to turn on the headlights.

we put the clutch in to start the car and jammed it into 1st and floored it. the front end got picked up and the car could not move. we steered left and right but the car just kept on going up into the air. my girlfriend was scared and she had boogers coming out of her nose while i was cursing. the car was going up and the back wheels were off of the ground. then i looked out of my window and saw that the parking lot park lines started getting smaller. both our windows were down this whole time. the front windshield started to crack and shake and the cracks spread from the passenger side to the driver's side. it popped outwards like it was pulled out.

something yanked my wrist. not aggressively. and the whole time in my head something was telling me "don't panic," or "don't be scared." and it wasn't in english in my head but i got the meaning. it wasn't a language. i don't know how to explain it. and on my girlfriend's side, it had her half-way out of the window. her butt was off of her seat, maybe one-and-a-half or two feet? and the car was pointed almost completely straight up at the stars. yet i saw no stars.

every time i tried looking at it, in front, a white film went over my eyes. it was kind of like staring at the sun with your eyelids closed. i could not hear her screaming but i know that she was screaming. my ears felt like they kept on popping from the altitude. i couldn't hear. the smell was like unbearable, like you want to close your nose. it was spicy, like pepper-sprayish, and clean at the same time. it was a smell that you could stand but you would close your nostrils because it still smells bad. when i tried to fight and get my wrist back in the car, that's when the grip got stronger. it was pulling my left arm up out of the window. there was no pain but it was strong. i was trying to fight off the grip on my wrist. my tongue was numb. the horn beeped by accident and the grip got a little loose. it beeped again in the struggle and my arm flopped down in the car. my girlfriend also fell back in her seat and we realized we were still up in the air. ! it took 2 seconds for the car to drop. when we dropped, the air bags came out. we floored it as fast as we could through the town. it was almost a straightaway to go to my girlfriend's house with very few turns to take. during this time, both of us couldn't stop crying. we arrived at her house and her mom asked, "what happened?" all this took place from 11pm to 12:30 am. it seemed like we were in the air for 10 minutes and it felt like it was forever. her mom called the police, and a policeman came.

the policeman did not believe us when we first told him what had happened until he looked at the vehicle. there were no scratches or dents or anything. he said that there was no reason for this to have happened to the car when there are no dents or scratches and no reason for the windshield to shatter and pop out the way it did. he had no explanation for why the windshield popped outwards. also, when i went to open my cell phone in front of the policemen, i got shocked by it.

on monday, i went to my doctor to get a whole physical to make sure i was ok. my wrist had a puncture wound while my forearm has a cut that is semi-circular and there's blood on it. i do remember that when i first looked at my arm after i got it back in the car, it was red with blood. but by the time we got to my girlfriend's house, there was no blood anywhere. on the center consul of the car, there is an imprint of her hand. i don't quite understand what the policeman said but it was something about the skin of her hand leaving an impression.

now, i don't like to feel bumps in the car, or feel anything that trembles like a boombox. i don't want to be out in dark areas at night. i also don't like to walk out to my mom's car, anymore, outside.
content.summary: 2 witness accounts  (credit: peter davenport - nuforc)

content.detailedDescription: On april 18th at about 12:00am 7 round objects were flying in the sky. they made no noise at all. my boyfriend was leaving my house, then he called me on the cell phone and said to come out side. i went out and he pointed to the sky. there was all these roundish objects. they were lit up kind of orange and it seemed something was spinning around it. the color changed or flashed in the middle of it (blue/white). two of them stayed the left and got really close together and separated again. they darted up and to the side and came together again. coincidentally there was what looked like a falling star that came flying down and disappeared. one was moving independently. 4 of them that were to the right started making formations. they made a triangular formation and held position. then they separated and took off in different directions. they came together again in a straight line formation. they separated again and came together in a circular formation then separated in different directions. they disappeared behind the clouds in the sky going up. we could barely see them through the clouds for a little while. then one came back down through the clouds and held it's position. again, there was no noise at all coming from any of these objects. we watched it and it started moving again up and over the direction of what looked like the 405 freeway. past carnegie middle school. i live in carson california and i am not sure how far these objects were from my city. they were very clear. and big. the neighbor looked out his window at us and i pointed to the sky and he looked and came outside. his wife watched from her porch. the neighbor watched with us for about 10 minutes. the object went up into the sky higher and higher up until it disappeared. we walked back towards the house and we were talking about how amazing it was then 1 of them came back but it stayed pretty high up in the sky it traveled straight then it appeared to slow way down. from my viewpoint it looked like it almost stopped. then it went straight up slowly though the clouds it went higher until it disappeared. at 12:10 i called the carson sheriff station and reported it. i tried to record it on the ipod nano but it couldn't from that distance. i have about 35 minutes of audio while trying to record it in the sky it 1 was about 10 minutes another was 20 minutes and a couple were about 2 minutes long. each time i tried to record it, it could not pick up the objects. they were very big. they were about the size of the moon when the moon is out. one time one of the objects moved really fast all the way across the sky. there were 2 small planes that had past by towards the end of the sighting. the planes did make noise. and they had the typical light that airplanes have and traveled in a flight pattern that planes fly.  these objects were bigger than those planes and they were farther away. these planes had to have seen something.  one was going one direction. then later the other was going a different direction. again, the planes did make noise. the objects did not make any noise at all. it was very quiet. i could hear the insects chirping. this went on for so long, that someone else besides us and the neighbors, had to have seen it. the formations that they made were incredible. it was also incredible how close they would get to each other and then hold their positions. we were not scared. we were just really amazed and excited. i don't think they were here to harm anyone or anything. please, if anyone else saw this, can you come forward and let us know what you saw. i was viewing this from carson california 90745 usa (la county area) this event lasted about an hour.  thank you
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on 35, somewhere between pt.Pleasant and southside, wv.  to my left, i saw what looked like a huge plane flying way too low.  i thought it was going to crash with it being so low, so i started to slow down.  the closer i got to it, i saw that it was a military cargo plane.  then, it seemed like it was not moving...So i stopped almost completely when i got right beside it.  it was not moving.  i turned down my radio and there was no noise from the plane.  it looked like a big military cargo plane, it couldn't have been any higher in the air than the top of a telephone pole.  i could read the stickers on it it was so low.  all i remember of the stickers is that there was an american flag and numbers and letters, no words.  the plane was not tipping in any direction.  it was completely still.  just sitting in the air.  after about a minute of being right beside it, traffic started coming from the other direction so i had to move.  once the traffic moved, i could not see it anywhere behind me.  there was no plane and no smoke from a crash.  it was just gone. i had the worst feeling of a panic attack i have ever felt.  it started just as soon as i looked over at the plane when it was beside me.  my entire chest hurt and i felt like i was going to vomit.  i was so afraid.  and, i do not know why!
content.summary: I saw what i thought was a plane, but it was just hanging in the air low to the ground with no noise.
content.locationName: Pt. Pleasant or Southside, West Virginia

content.detailedDescription: I was simply testing out my cell phone video camera and was video taping a low-flying jet from my living room window. when i uploaded the video to my computer and played it back i could see a strange light in the background moving from left to right below the clouds. if you look at it frame-by-frame you will see that it goes behind the tree and that it seems to be a source of light. this was in broad daylight. it even seems to blink in and out or move at incredible speeds when you attempt to analyze the video frame-by-frame but possibly this is some sort of light aberration. i thought it was interesting and so i am making this report. it starts at about 15 seconds into the video. this was uploaded directly from my cell phone and has not been put into any other format. i uploaded it to youtube as well http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=fgse1kay9q8
content.summary: Strange light found on a short video i took with my cell phone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from my house in rutherfordton, nc towards the mall in spindale down hwy 74 bypass. it's one of the flatter areas of the county. 

in the sky i saw a triangle of red lights. it caught my eye because i knew that a radio tower would only be one light. thinking quickly i realized i couldn't identify what it was using logic and common sense. 

it seemed to disappear and reappear in another nearby area of the sky.

i got to the mall and parked on a hill so i could see it, and sat watching it for a while. it continued to skip around the sky, disappearing and reappearing somewhere else. eventually, the lights began to rotate in a circular pattern, with one red light lighting up at a time in a triangular pattern. 

after that, it zoomed across the sky to the east, and i lost sight of it. 

i have three friends who have told me about experiences seeing something similar around the same time, and they had time-loss experiences. i only found out about that within the last 6 months or so. they were driving in the same area and saw a large black triangular shape floating above their car. hours later, they sat around the kitchen table at one person's house without any knowledge or memory of how they got there, as if time had skipped forward a few hours. they don't like to talk about it. it was a really frightening experience for them. they had never been able to begin to explain it until they heard my story about the red triangular lights in the same area on the same day, and how i sat and watched it and saw it fly away.
content.summary: Triangle of red lights

content.detailedDescription:
I have had the honor to witness, and video  a clan of m.E.F.F.'s( mechanical 
energy force fields).It all started when my neighbor put up infrared led's
 to stop my cameras. this didnt work so some how, don't ask me how but he was able to infiltrate the city street light's. since that date 021310
i started noticing strange events on camera.What appeared to be black spheres of energy started to do unexplained movements and sounds.This would go on every few days,and when i noticed something different i made sure to have it filmed.So this is it people!! i have watched and learned studied there movements, patterns,functions,and how they work together as separate 
forces, with a special function.Like bee's or insects, looking and gathering
 useful energy.Processing it, then taking it back to the triangle in the sky.
when to day's work is done all six types combine and form one side of the triangle.This in turn powers the main craft, to open the" gate" for inter dimension transfer.Other craft and forces are able to come and go when it's
open.I knew from the very first sighting, that this must be recorded every second that i saw something,so i could study it more closely. since this started, i have lost most friends and people that respected me. i cant talk about making contact, or waking up to find three pages of formulas for time travel. i have not seen them in two weeks now i don't know if they are done with me, or just moved on.What i have will shock most of you this is to be taken very serious most people will not watch more then two videos.I want help with tracing pulsarts and quasarts, so we can collect the useful anti-matter.Then we could open a sub-parallel black hole, all the benefits 
of a black hole but no side effects. how cool, we are about one hundred years behind, so we need to take this more serious.Contact is real not like the movies always but through telepathic mind sensory communication.If you you tube "footage of a real black hole" by mr.Wildrhino, you will see just the first part of the film it actually seems to collapse or die.You will see in the end how it looks like a nuclear explosion in the sky,but its sub parallel
so we don't know it's there.My i.R camera can see it is the only way i could witness this.Any way i have a months worth of footage that blows me away every time i watch it. show me if people are ready for this and i'll try to upload more,i don't know why it's so hard to upload but i get kicked off most times. i try ,the truth is really out there.
i am no body special(before) i would have never believe this stuff, we need to think on a simpler level with everything under are noses. ask me any thing you want about clan(bh021310).I have all i have spoken in a very well documented film and photo format. want to see actual picture's of what people are trying to draw? when i started to read the stories of eye witness account's. i knew i cannot keep silent no more. what ever is going to happen to me has been planned well long before i knew about it.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Seven types, well documented over a month

content.detailedDescription: I happened to be in my bathroom and looked out at the sky as i always do and there was that strange circle of bright light.  i watched it for a few minutes and then it went sideways to the other bright light.  this was south/southeast.  then on nov.10 2008 the exact same thing happened, the same positions.  we have our airport pretty much in that area.  it used to be a military field.  the manchester airport now. i called the police station, they said it was not their job  i knew it was a ufo.  i got tired of watching it and went back to bed.  i am not afraid of ufo's. regards, ann e estee
content.summary: Two "stars" moving diagionally back and forth

content.detailedDescription: I left my home to go to the shops at approx 2132 gmt and saw a very bright orange hazy light with a blue glow around it.I first thought it was a helicopter it was flying from the east and it was absolutely silent. i live very close to luton aitport in the uk and am very used to planes and helicopters going over. this was nothing like either. i also knew that volcanic ash covered the uk and it was a no fly zone. then the light started heading upwards and got fainter and then it stopped dead at which point i ran to get my partner to see. the light then moved slowly and stopped again then it started to flicker and was gone as if heading upwards. when it had gone i looked back to the east and there was another light moving exactly the same as the first and did exactly the same disappearing in the same place. i have to admit to being a non believer but i was exhilerated by the sight and as i said i am very used to police helicopters and planes going past but never have they been silent or stopped dead in the air as i saw tonight. at the moment i saw the lights there were no flights due to volcanic ash and i just can't explain it at all.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two bright orange lights going from e to w stopping still then flying upwards
